pageContext.description: Dimensions: “max. d. 27.0; B. (2 frag?)  21mm; B. band ~3.0-3.5; T band 2.5-3.1”,   ,  Typology: round section […] but some tendency to flatten on inner face; 5 complete hoops- prob. much of another in missing part; most hoops virt. Touching - v. small gap – one more adrift., Manufacture: diag. scmks. on much of wire-including surfaces closed against others-certainly ancient grinding., Condition: two joining parts seen 1979, almost certainly a third when drawn by PKD 1978; evidently no intact terminals; none of breaks look part. fresh, but some glue covered, Attached Material: light brown soil, Labels/Markings: black ink: ‘57/347’,
pageContext.other: Lower right corner: PIF; AFI; DFC; SI; CI; Source MV; Rec. SN Oct 79
pageContext.remarks: Surface: good mottled grass-to blue-green p.; occ. flaked spots to dull brown or lighter green dry surs.; dull chocolate brown core exposed at breaks
